TopicTitle: I came, I saw, I punched planets.

Articles.Content:
Hey Kerbal Kommunity. I've been playing the game for about 4 months. I've recently been doing a series on imgur (username SilentySky42) and reddit.com/r/kerbalspaceprogram (/u/Silent_Sky) in which I send a 20 ton fist to punch every single planet and moon in the solar system. Some of you may know me from there. Others may not, I will re-post all the albums from these missions in a thread on Mission Reports. So far I've punched Mun, Kerbin, Minmus, Eeloo, Jool, Laythe, Vall, Tylo, Bop, Pol, and Dres. Next on the list is Duna and Ike, then the rest of the planets and moons. Then a number of special punches. I punch space. It's gonna be fun here.

Edited October 4, 2014 by Planet_Puncher
It is indeed fun here. Welcome to the forum.
Hello Planet Puncher! Welcome to the forums Glad you decided to join us in the mad house!

I posted my finished albums in Mission Reports for those who want to see.

Edited October 4, 2014 by Planet_Puncher
Saw your stuff on Reddit, I crack up every time. Welcome to the forums, and have some rep to start you off!
